description:
From our office in Cherry Hill, New Jersey, the attorneys at the Marrone Law Firm, LLC, serve a diverse range of clients throughout the surrounding Philadelphia metro area and all across the state who have legal needs involving personal injury, criminal defense or real estate law.

Based in Philadelphia, we have a history that dates back more than 25 years, and our law firm has become one of the leading legal practices in the region for those seeking the highest level of advocacy and support possible for their serious and complex legal challenges. As evidence of our success, we have earned recognition from U.S. World and News Reports as one of the Best Law Firms for Medical Malpractice, and The National Trial Lawyers has voted us among the Top 100 Trial Lawyers in the country.

Having recovered millions of dollars in settlements and awards for our plaintiff injury clients, we have also earned our membership in the Million Dollar Advocates Forum. Through our criminal defense practice, we have secured numerous acquittals, dismissals and not guilty verdicts for our clients facing charges ranging from DUI and traffic violations to drug offenses, sex offenses, white collar crimes and more.

For more information about how the Marrone Law Firm, LLC, can help you protect your rights and interests while fighting to achieve the justice you deserve, you can call our office or visit our website to schedule a free initial consultation.
